Name: Percentage of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' out of all cases

Name: Number of times Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 occurs in the entire event log
Percentage of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 that are followed by SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Frequency of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 appearing before SW-Reviewer Agreed across all variants
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Percentage of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 that occur in variants leading to SW-EIC Accept versus those leading to SW-EIC Reject or SW-EIC Major Revision
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' out of all 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Number of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 occurrences that are preceded by Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1
Metric: Number of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' activities for cases where activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' occurs

Name: Percentage of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 among all reminder-related activities (e.g., compared to Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1)
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' out of all 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'

Name: Frequency of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 in variants where SW-Reviewer No Response eventually occurs
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' out of all 'SW-Reviewer No Response'

Name: Percentage of cases containing Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 that ultimately result in a successful reviewer assignment (i.e., followed by SW-Reviewer Agreed without subsequent decline or unavailability)
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Number of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 occurrences per variant type, especially in high-frequency versus low-frequency variants
Percentage of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 that appear after SW-Reviewer Selection is 3 days late or SW-Reviewer Selection is 1 week late
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Selection is 3 days late'

Name: Frequency of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 in cases that undergo multiple rounds of revision (e.g., involving RW- or RSW- prefixed activities)
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' out of all 'RW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Percentage of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 that are not followed by any further reviewer-related activity within 14 days
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' out of all cases

Name: Ratio of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 to SW-AE Assign Reviewers occurrences in the same case
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' out of all 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Percentage of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 occurring in cases that eventually reach SW-Awaiting EIC Decision versus those that terminate earlier (e.g., via Immediate Reject Decision from the Checklist or Manuscript is Withdrawn)
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' out of all 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'
